snippet: John Velazquez made the journey from New York to Fair Hill in Elkton, Md., on Sunday morning to ride Union Rags for the first time. Union Rags was scheduled to put in his final work, ahead of Saturday's Belmont Stakes.
abstract: John Velazquez made the journey from New York to Fair Hill in Elkton, Md., on Sunday morning to ride Union Rags for the first time. Union Rags was scheduled to put in his final work, ahead of Saturday's Belmont Stakes.

headline.main: Velazquez Teams With Union Rags for Impressive Work
